title: ILoftFeatureData.GetFeatureScopeBodiesCount
description: Gets the number of solid bodies affected by the loft feature in a multibody part.
returns: Number of solid bodies affected by the loft feature in a multibody part
remarks:
Call this method before calling
ILoftFeatureData::IGetFeatureScopeBodies
to determine the size of the array for that method.
If
ILoftFeatureData::FeatureScope
is false, then the return value will be 0.
